reviewText: This is one of my favorite Laurel and Hardy collections. It contains Be Big, The Perfect Day (one of their best shorts ever), Night Owls, and Helpmates. Four hilarious shorts!

If only the youth of today could be exposed to this timeless classic!

Laurel and Hardy are funny. And they do it without foul language, sexual inuendo, violence or racism. How refreshing to watch them.

This particular tape was full of some of their more well known sketches.

Well worth the money and can be enjoyed by anyone! A miracle today.
